text: Werner Holzer (September 23, 1937 - October 29, 2018) was an American wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman 70 kg at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of the United States Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Werner Holzer
